subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Jim Furyk, a struggling member of the American Ryder Cup team, had hoped to be the one to decide the tournament, knowing full well that failure is the flip side of success.
snippet: Jim Furyk, a struggling member of the American Ryder Cup team, had hoped to be the one to decide the tournament, knowing full well that failure is the flip side of success.
